TEXT.TITLE: TO-FITNESS <TFIT> IN DISTRIBUTION DEAL
TEXT.BODY: To-Fitness Inc said it has been named exclusive Florida distributor for the hardpack version of the frozen dessert Tofutti by Tofutti Brands Inc <TOF>, replacing Pillsbury Co's <PSY> Haagen Dazs. Reuter
